title: A Flavor to be Proud of
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Your manjuus are so delicious, Honoka-chan! Red bean paste is the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, thanks. Eat this one too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Thanks for the food! *Munch Munch*.... Are you not going to eat, Honoka-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m used to eating them, so it’s fine~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Even though it’s this delicious!? If I were you, I’d eat these any time<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I-, is that so….? Then I guess…. *Munch*….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s weird for me to say it, but it is delicious, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You know…. You-chan, this isn’t the only flavor Homura has….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>So, the month after the next one we’re going to use a different kind of red bean. If you like this one’s taste, then I’m sure you’re going to like that one too….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Do beans really change that much….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, it’s totally different. Of course the bean itself will taste different, but for this one we use this much sugar, and use this much salt, and other things too, even the process changes a little bit! It’s a specialty of Homura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>A-, Amazing…. I’m looking forward to it! I’ll come back with the rest of Aqours to compare them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
